name: 劉宇晨
objective:
本課程將針對電子電路在電力電子轉換器的應用上教授電路的分析與設計，本課程包含了電力電子學、電子學、控制系統等領域。
課程的內容包含:

1.	基礎理論的回顧
2.	模擬軟體的學習與應用
3.	被動 / 主動元件介紹
4.	轉換器的電路架構說明
5.	轉換器的電路動作分析
6.	功率開關的特性與其應用的場合
7.	功率轉換器的損耗分析
8.	轉換器的基本控制模式介紹
9.	轉換器的控制迴路設計與模擬驗證
10.	周邊的保護電路與感測電路介紹
11.	設計案例說明
12.	進階電力電子技術分析探討

This course will teach the analysis and design of circuits for the application of electronic circuits in power electronic converters. This course covers the fields of power electronics, electronics, and control systems.

Course content includes:

1. Review of power electronics background
2. Learning a simulation software
3. Introduction of the principle of the passive components
4. Description of the circuit topologies of the converter
5. Analysis of the circuit operation principle of the converter
6. Introduction of the characteristics of power switches and their applications
7. Introduction of the loss analysis of power converters 
8. Introduction to the control method of the converter
9. Introduction of the control loop design and simulation verification of the converter
10. Introduction of peripheral protection circuit and sensing circuit
11. Design case review
12. Introduction of the advanced power electronics topic
schedule:
Week 1: Power Electronics Application Notes
Week 2: Introduction to Passive Components (1)
Week 3: Introduction to Passive Components (2)
Week 4: Introduction to Power Semiconductor Devices (1)
Week 5: Introduction to Power Semiconductor Devices (2)
Week 6: Circuit Topology of DC-DC Converter and Its Steady-State Characteristics (1)
Week 7: Circuit Topology and Steady-State Characteristics of DC-DC Converters (2)
Week 8: Loss Analysis for Converter Architectures
Week 9: Mid-Term Exam
Week 10: Control Mode Description and Design of Converters (1)
Week 11: Control Mode Description and Design of Converters (2)
Week 12: Introduction to Power IC Circuits and Their Applications (1)
Week 13: Introduction to Power IC Circuits and Their Applications (2)
Week 14: Introduction to Peripheral Protection Circuits
Week 15: Introduction to Sensing Circuits
Week 16: Advanced Power Electronics Technology Analysis and Discussion (1)
Week 17: Advanced Power Electronics Technology Analysis and Discussion (2)
Week 18: Final Exam/Report

[1] Robert Erickson and Dragan Maksimovic, “Fundamentals of Power Electronics,” 2nd Edition, Kluwer Academic Publishers, 2001.
[2] Christophe P. Basso “Switch-Mode Power Supply,” 2nd Edition
[3] ByungCho Choi, “Pulsewidth Modulatied DC-to-DC Power Conversion”
[4] Robert W., Maksimovic, Dragan, “Fundamentals of Power Electronics,” 3/e/, Springer/2020
